title: Self Love Notes II: Affirming Poetry & Prose
description: Self Love Notes Affirming Poetry & Prose is an inspirational collection of poems and prose that celebrates your intrinsic self-worth. It is a source of energy and light, a treasure trove of affirmations and meditations that will uplift you when you need to be reminded of your value and inner beauty. I am done breathing lifeinto someone elseâ€™s dreamwhile not investingin the personI am destined to become.I will no longerlose myself,wastingirreplaceable timeby existing in between.- My DestinyLike a trusted friend who's always encouraging you, allow these words to uplift you when you want to feel that you are capable of anything.
author: Michelle G. Stradford
